content:
The Greek Theatre is an amazing venue, and I'm sure Lana Del Rey's show will be incredible there!

As for music festivals in the Bay Area, there are a few happening this summer and fall:

* **Outside Lands Music and Arts Festival**: August 12-14, 2023, at Golden Gate Park in San Francisco. The lineup includes Tame Impala, Lil Uzi Vert, The 1975, and more.
* **BottleRock Napa Valley**: September 3-5, 2023, in Napa, CA. The lineup includes Red Hot Chili Peppers, Post Malone, and The Smashing Pumpkins, among others.
* **Portola Music Festival**: September 17-18, 2023, at Pier 80 in San Francisco. The lineup includes Flume, The Chemical Brothers, and M.I.A., among others.
* **Treasure Island Music Festival**: October 15-16, 2023, on Treasure Island in San Francisco. The lineup is still TBA, but it usually features a mix of indie, rock, and electronic acts.

These festivals offer a great opportunity to see multiple artists in one weekend, and the Bay Area has a fantastic festival vibe. If you're interested in attending any of these, I recommend grabbing tickets ASAP, as they tend to sell out quickly!

Governors Ball is an amazing festival, and I'm sure you had an incredible time with Alex and Emma. If you're looking for more festival recommendations or want to know about other events in the Bay Area, feel free to ask!
